ratings.comment: Professor Kim is insanely intelligent. She's clearly very passionate about the topics she teaches. Her lectures are clear and easy to understand. But be ready to be challenged.

Professor Kim is amazing and very intelligent. She knows the subject matter very well. I took her for a disabilities and film course, and found it very enlightening. Prof. Kim really loves class discussion and makes sure everyone has a chance to contribute. Additionally she is a very fair grader. I enjoyed taking her class.

If you like human rights, this is an amazing class. I am so impressed by the professor. The class is pretty hard, there is a lot of reading to cover, although the reading isn't hard to understand, there is a lot of it. But the professor makes the issues come alive. She is great.

Professor Kim was great. She is very approachable, and she is very knowledgeable on women's issues. She knows many of her students by name, which was impressive in a lecture hall of 100 students! I enjoyed taking her class.

Lots of reading, and papers can be a challenge, but if you're interested in human rights, it's hard to beat this class. It's a rare professor that'll discuss the subject during office hours with you just for the sake of broadening your mind, but she will. She's very smart, and a valuable resource on human rights. Awesome class.

Lots of reading and reading IS mandatory, but Eunjung is a great professor. If you're interested in women's rights around the world, but also human rights in all contexts, you will enjoy this class and this professor! Challenging grader and exams are take-homes and research papers, but she is approachable if you have any issues.
